Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief called Musashi, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan was making the turn from Meiji era into modernization.
The silent film depicts the world through discordant music, creating a cinema verite effect that evokes nostalgia of the past.<|end_of_text|>
